attachDocBullet1: Click on the 'Browse'/'Choose Files' button to select one or many documents.(fr)
attachDocBullet2: Give each document a title and select a document type from the drop-down list.(fr)
docSizeBullet1: The size of the individual document attached to the online form will be tallied and cannot exceed a total size of 70Mb(fr)
docAcceptBullet1: Some file formats, such as .zip and .exe files, cannot be included on the online form.(fr)
docRemoveBullet1: Click on button 'Remove Document' to remove a document from the online form.(fr)
docRemoveBullet2: To remove all documents at once, click on the 'Remove All Documents' button.(fr)
